name: Steven Trojcak
title: Part Owner
disc: Trojcak is the founder and part owner of Community Salons. Responsible for being the spokes person for our company. Deals with most of the negotiations with all the businesses. Establishes the contracts between Commuinty Salons and the other businesses involved. Trojcak also gathers general information needed about the businesses for our web database. Responsible for answering any questions dealing with issues amongst businesses, contracts, and any general questions about our company

name: Jeret Goad
title: Part Owner/Web Developer
disc: Goad is part owner and web developer for Community Salons. He is responsible for creating and maintaining the web databases, contracts, flyers, and general information required by each company that is being represented on our web database. Goad also helps with negotiations with businesses on a smaller scale. Main contributor to the front-end development and any updates or maintenance required. Goad would be the preferred person to contact. Goad is the preferred person to contact dealing with any issues or questions about the technological side of Community Salons.

name: Bingxu Ren
title: Web Developer
disc: Ren is part-developer for Community Salons web database. Ren's main contribution is configuring and maintaining our web application's back-end services. He also helps with any changes, additions, and deletions to our stored database. Helps Goad with any maintenance or updates to the web application.
